body:
For some unknown for me reason in case of Debug build in Visual Studio 2015
sizeof(TensorImpl) == sizeof(int64_t) * 13
instead of 
sizeof(TensorImpl) == sizeof(int64_t) * 12
which leads to the failure of static_assert.
It can be unused variable(s) that is optimized during release build or just some additional compiler stuff used for debugging purposes. I didn't investigate the real reason. 
This is added just to make debug build with Visual Studio 2015 possible.
